Scenario: Household resilience built through care economy participation
    Given Robert and Jennifer manage enormous complexity
    And they face potential crises: parent health emergencies, child crises, financial shocks
    When household_elohim builds resilience
    Then it should help them build emergency preparedness
    And connect them to community resources that can provide backup support
    And ensure they have networks to lean on in crisis
    And recognize that care economy participation builds reciprocal support
    And surface their accumulated social capital
    And help them understand that their care contributions create household resilience
    And support sustainable household functioning amid unpredictable demands
